attributes.action: Establish the Dixon Plan, as used in Craigavon Borough Council, NI, as the national model of academic selection, which tests and segregates pupils according to academic ability at 14 as opposed to 11.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Dixon Plan has worked wonders in the very few instances of it being used, and at a time when educational reform is on the books I am perplexed as to why this system has not yet been offered as a reasonable substitute for the 11+.
